title: Pediatricians calling anti-vaccine movement a growing problem
author: Marine Glisovic
description: A growing trend that's becoming a growing problem according to pediatricians, is the anti-vaccine movement.Little Rock pediatrician Dr. Steve Thompson tells Channel 7, the most difficult obstacle they're facing is the fear of parents and the claims made on
